description: Actors and singers read classic children's stories, accompanied by delightful animations, and punctuated by the cheerful musings of children.
keywords: title directed by female,based on children's book
name: Goodnight Moon

review.name: Absolutely Charming
review.reviewBody:
One of the most charming kid flicks I've ever seen. The very familiar "Goodnight, Moon" opens and closes this short, and captures real-life children commenting on sleep and dreams, both good and bad. So refreshing; the children are absolutely captivating! Our daughter is in her 30s, but my spouse and I watched this several times, and when I spoke to my daughter to tell her about it, we both recited "Goodnight, Moon" from memory, and it brought back a tidal wave of "Remember when"s from both of us.

Do watch it and share it with friends and family, both little and grown!
